metadata.title: Hanes Cool DRI Performance Men's Long-Sleeve T-Shirt_Deep Royal_X-Large
features: The gray color is 90% cotton, 10% polyester.
description: Wanna stay dry? No sweat. Our Cool DRI T-Shirt's dry-fast keeps you cool and comfortable even when the competition heats up. Plus Cool DRI T-Shirts carry an excellent Ultraviolet Protection Factor rating of 50+.Rapid-dry interlock jersey knit wicks away to keep you cool50+ UPF rating for excellent UV protection.More tailored contemporary fit.Tag-free neckline.Double-needle stitching in neck sleeves and bottom hem for added durability.Safety colors offer enhanced visibility.
metadata.details: {"Item Weight": "7.36 Ounces", "Item model number": "482L", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "March 23, 2015"}
